items.title: Goldman Sachs, BofA raise gold price forecasts amid trade-war tensions
items.description: Goldman Sachs on Wednesdayraised its end-2025 gold price forecast to $3,300 per ounce, upfrom $3,100, with a target range of $3,250 to $3,520 per ounce. The investment bank cited...

items.title: Jefferies profit falls on weaker bond trading, equity underwriting
items.description: Jefferies' first-quarterprofit fell nearly 15%, the bank reported on Wednesday, as bondtrading weakened and stock market deals were stalled due touncertainty sparked by shifting U.S. trade policy...
